dao.name: CHK_ROOM_COD_ORDER_IS_EXIST_BY_ROOMCOD
dao.statement: select count(*) as room_count from room_cod_order where athena_id = :athena_id and room_cod = :room_cod

dao.name: QRY_ROOM_COD_ORDER
dao.statement: select * from room_cod_order where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and wrs_sort_cod <> -1
